name: Pediatric Mets
title: Pediatric Mets
notes:
**Note:** Use code 70 when the only information is “distant metastasis, NOS,” and there is no documentation regarding the specific metastases.
* If there are specific metastasis documented that are not listed in codes 10, 30, or 50, assign code 50 for “other specified distant metastasis.”
rows:

WITH or WITHOUT distant lymph nodes or lung metastasis
